headline: Invesco Mortgage Capital Inc. Announces Monthly Common Dividend and Provides Update on Book Value and Leverage
summary: Invesco Mortgage Capital Inc. (NYSE: IVR) (the "Company") today announced the declaration of a cash dividend of $0.12 per share of common stock for the month of January 2026. The dividend will be paid on February 13, 2026 to stockholders of record at the close of business on January 26, 2026, with an ex-dividend date of January 26, 2026.

headline: Why Invesco (IVZ) Stock Is Trading Up Today
summary: Shares of asset management firm Invesco (NYSE:IVZ) jumped 3.5% in the afternoon session after Barclays raised its price target on the stock and the company announced a major transaction for its Canadian fund business.

headline: BlackRock Beats on Q4 Earnings as Revenues & AUM Increase Y/Y
summary: BLK beats Q4 earnings as revenues surge and AUM hits a record high, lifted by strong net inflows despite higher expenses.

headline: Invesco’s Sleepy ETF Ended Up Ripping 33% While No One Was Watching

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Invesco (IVZ) After Its 73% One-Year Rally?
summary: If you are wondering whether Invesco's share price fairly reflects its prospects today, you are not alone. This article is built to help you frame that question clearly.
